author: newsr.in
title: Not Just Silicon Valley: Why American Business Has a Diversity Issue - newsR
text: The successes of Silicon Valley are well-chronicled -- some of our brightest minds take a singular idea and turn it into a billion-dollar company that changes the world. Every venture capitalist across the United States aims to be the one who discovers the next Facebook, Snapchat, or Uber, so naturally, the first step is to try ... Â»
